original: @63a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byang du gzhug bar 'dod pa'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: @63a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo // bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byang du gzhug bar 'dod pa'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

original: klu gdug pa dang ldan ba'i sa gang na gnas pa'i sa nas /
analyzed: klu gdug pa dang ldan ba'i sa gang na gnas pa'i sa nas /
translated: The practitioner who is bound by the samaya and who wishes to subjugate the nāgas should go to a place where there are vicious nāgas.🔽Take earth, stone, wood, water, and so on from that place.

original: sa dang rdo dang shing dang chu la sogs pa blangs la stegs bu khru gang ba cig byas la /
analyzed: sa dang rdo dang shing dang chu la sogs pa blangs la stegs bu khru gang ba cig byas la /
translated: Make a platform one cubit high.

original: de la snga ma bzhin du klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: de la snga ma bzhin du klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Draw the maṇḍala of the eight nāgas as before.

original: mtha' ma klu shing sna tshogs bas bskor la gzhag go //
analyzed: mtha' ma klu shing sna tshogs bas bskor la gzhag go //
translated: Place it around the perimeter, surrounded by various nāga trees.

original: de'i byang du dur khrod kyi sa las gru gsum nag po byas te /
analyzed: de'i byang du dur khrod kyi sa las gru gsum nag po byas te /
translated: To the north of that, make a black triangle from charnel ground earth.

original: de'i steng du mdze thod kyi nang du bsgrub bya'i gos dum bu'am dri chan dri chu rjes sa la sogs pa gang rnyed dang / bag zan bsres la de'i khong du ra'i khrag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang rus ngang yul dang sa khyim dang / pha tshan dang dur ming bris la dur khrod kyi ras ma la sna tshogs rdo rje dug khrag gis bris pas dril la yugs sa @63b mo'i skra skud phyin ka log gis rgya gram bsgril la gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i steng du mdze thod kyi nang du bsgrub bya'i gos dum bu'am dri chan dri chu rjes sa la sogs pa gang rnyed dang / bag zan bsres la de'i khong du ra'i khrag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang rus ngang yul dang sa khyim dang / pha tshan dang dur ming bris la dur khrod kyi ras ma la sna tshogs rdo rje dug khrag gis bris pas dril la yugs sa @63b mo'i skra skud phyin ka log gis rgya gram bsgril la gzhag go //
translated: Wrap it with a cloth from a charnel ground on which a crossed vajra has been drawn with poison and blood, and tie it with the widow’s hair string in the reverse way.

original: de'i nang du spre'u'i khrag dang mdze khrag dang ra rog po'i khrag gtig go //
analyzed: de'i nang du spre'u'i khrag dang mdze khrag dang ra rog po'i khrag gtig go //
translated: In the center of that, put the blood of a monkey, the blood of a leper, and the blood of a black goat.

original: lcags phye dang dur khrod kyi rdo phye dang / yungs kar dang / yungs nag dang / dug sna tshogs la klu brgyad kyi snying po 'bum phrag bdun bzlas shing brub /
analyzed: lcags phye dang dur khrod kyi rdo phye dang / yungs kar dang / yungs nag dang / dug sna tshogs la klu brgyad kyi snying po 'bum phrag bdun bzlas shing brub /
translated: Add iron filings, charnel ground stone filings, white mustard seed, black mustard seed, and various poisons, and recite the essence mantras of the eight nāgas seven hundred thousand times.

original: skabs su klu rnams la bstod cing gtor ma sbyin /
analyzed: skabs su klu rnams la bstod cing gtor ma sbyin /
translated: From time to time, praise the nāgas and offer bali.

original: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
translated: Make supplications for the desired aim.

original: klu'i snying po'i gzhug la aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat ces gdags so //
analyzed: klu'i snying po'i gzhug la aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat ces gdags so //
translated: In the middle of the nāga heart, say “So-and-so die!”

original: de nas rgyud rdzogs pa brgya bklags la /
analyzed: de nas rgyud rdzogs pa brgya bklags la /
translated: Then, having read the complete tantra one hundred times,

original: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la klu'i pho brang du mnan ba byas na bsgrub bya de zla ba lnga nas gdon mi za bar brlag par nges so //
analyzed: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la klu'i pho brang du mnan ba byas na bsgrub bya de zla ba lnga nas gdon mi za bar brlag par nges so //
translated: make offerings and praises, and bury it in the nāga palace. It is certain that the victim will be destroyed within five months.

original: de yang rgyal rigs la gtad na mdze thod kyis bya /
analyzed: de yang rgyal rigs la gtad na mdze thod kyis bya /
translated: Moreover, if it is aimed at a kṣatriya, use a leper’s skull.

original: rje'u rigs la glang dmar po'i rva g-yas pa /
analyzed: rje'u rigs la glang dmar po'i rva g-yas pa /
translated: If it is a vaiśya, use the right horn of a red ox.

original: bram ze la rabs chad kyi thod pa /🔽dmangs rigs la sbal pa'i lus por bya /
analyzed: bram ze la rabs chad kyi thod pa / dmangs rigs la sbal pa'i lus por bya /
translated: If it is a brahmin, use the skull of a eunuch.🔽If it is a śūdra, use the body of a frog.

original: gdol pa la phag nag po'i thod par bya /
analyzed: gdol pa la phag nag po'i thod par bya /
translated: If it is a caṇḍāla, use the skull of a black pig.

original: glud dang chu gtor ci mang du gtong ngo //
analyzed: glud dang chu gtor ci mang du gtong ngo //
translated: Offer as much ransom and water torma as possible.

original: bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byad du gzhug pa'i cho ga srog gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bsgrub bya klu rnams kyi byad du gzhug pa'i cho ga srog gcod kyi spu gri zhes bya ba /
translated: The rite of placing the victim in the noose of the nāgas is called “The Razor of Life-Cutting.”

original: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of glorious Dipaṃkara Śrījñāna is complete.
